page.title: 17POPULAR GAMES IN SHAWBURY
page.content: The younger children like{skipping- sometimes they skip alone,sometimes two people turn the rope while another one skips.They often chant{rhymes} whilst skipping.Sometimes they play{ {tag}or{horses}. The older ones like to play a complicated version of{Hide-and-Seek} with calls like '123 in','False Alarm' and 'Release All prisoners',or{Kiss {Chase}which is like tag,but when you're caught you are kissed. Boys play{football}and everyone likes{rounders.}Other games include {'Mother May I?''Red Letter'}and {'French Polo'-}when one child guesses or tigs another before he reaches base. In the right season{Conkers}and{ {Marbles}are played. Small children play{House,}the older ones{Pretending {Games.}Most games are for large groups;not many people are left out.
